title: Top Five “One Crazy Night” Movies and ‘Bodies Bodies Bodies’
description:
Joanna Robinson joins Sean to dig into A24’s new Gen Z horror-comedy-whodunit ‘Bodies Bodies Bodies’ (0:00) and to share their five favorite “one crazy night” movies (1:00). Then, Halina Reijn, the Dutch actress and director of ‘Bodies Bodies Bodies,’ talks with Sean about how she transitioned to working behind the camera full-time (1:12:00).

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guests: Joanna Robinson and Halina Reijn
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
